message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I can't go as low as $110, I'm willing to come down to $130. It's a steal for this quality!
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $125?
